SageTVPlugin.Name: AutoSleep
SageTVPlugin.Description: AutoSleep on 2 hours of inactivity. Timeout (in minutes) can be changed in sageclient.properties: plugins/df/auto_sleep_time=120
SageTVPlugin.Author: Flachbar, Fuzzy
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes: 1.1.0 - Last v6 Release by Flachbar 1.2.0 - Initial v7 Release ported by Fuzzy
